REVIEW.Name: Staff
REVIEW.RHighlight: It was the smallest of details – like herbal incense hand-picked to enhance the day’s vibe – that greatly contributed to our spiritually enhancing and rejuvenating stay. Loved the tasty, organic food (don’t miss Made’s health-giving smoothies at breakfast!), Hindu rituals and full-on peacefulness, from bathing under the stars in outdoor stone bathtubs to drinking in the rice-field views from the bedroom porch – armed, naturally, with a sundowner.
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
As spiritual souls with environmentally and community-aware leanings and a thirst for local culture, this one-of-a-kind villa has our name all over it. Villa Hansa (no coincidence it’s named after the Goddess of Knowledge) offers visitors so much more than just another Balinese deluxe villa (although the design is pretty gorgeous too). The devoted staff and ever-smiling manager sustain the Hansa philosophy when the owners are away. As the villa’s spiritual advisor, the manager is amazingly knowledgeable about Balinese culture and traditions, he was happy to divulge all over dinner and accompany us to a traditional Hindu ceremony in the local village. If you’re lucky enough to stay during a full or new moon (like we did), you also get a rare opportunity to watch Hindu priests bless the property. Staff, too, went out of their way to introduce us to daily Balinese life: teaching us how to make traditional palm leaf offerings and Indonesian delicacies in the kitchen – activities that the children really enjoyed.
And it’s refreshing to find a villa where the owners are committed to eco-friendly practices, a healthy lifestyle and giving back to the community. These surfing and yoga devotees support local organic farmers, practice recycling in the kitchens and insist on biodegrable household cleaning. We also learnt about their wonderful trust fund, the Hansa Foundation, set-up to educate local children in traditional culture, arts, music and the environment.
We thought that Villa Hansa would be ideal for groups of friends and for family groups spanning a wide age range – there are bedroom configurations here to suit all.
REVIEW.RUnpleasantSurprise: There are three resident dogs here, but if requested, these can be excluded from the grounds during your stay. Some might find a lack of TV/DVD players in the bedrooms a tad limiting but there is so much more to enjoy at Villa Hansa, we certainly didn’t miss them – and there’s always the TV room.

REVIEW.Name: Leslie Madden
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved our stay at the villa. This was our first time to Bali and it made quite an impression. Our family is looking forward to coming back again someday. We had our family of 5 (with 3 teenage daughters) plus my retired parents. The main living area was big and comfortable and decorated beautifully. The bedrooms were all lovely and were very roomy. The bathrooms tended to have a few insects, but was expected since they are outdoor bathrooms. The staff was amazing and catered to our every wish. We felt like they were family by the end of our week. We also enjoyed having masseuses come to give us poolside massages. The pool and poolside area was gorgeous and we enjoyed it every day.

REVIEW.Name: nina jones .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a great time staying in Villa Hansa, very relaxing, beautiful villa with great staff.

REVIEW.Name: Brett Randall
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Hansa Villa is as you see in all the photo's, a Lovely villa complex, all 4 kingsize bedrooms are really great and spacious, beautiful 4 poster beds, the staff are fantastic nothing is too much trouble, pool and surrounding area's are very spacious and well kept gardens, we used the villa's car with the driver all the time, to Ubud shopping and local drives nearby, meals are cooked by the chef's if needed we had breakfast every morning, they cook what you would like to have..

REVIEW.Name: Han Ching Choong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We would like to say a massive thank you to everyone here, who have made our stay so wonderful! Everything from the people and the food to the facilities have made this holiday unforgettable. All of our meals were delicious, Villa Hansa is so peaceful and we all feel so relaxed. All the staff have been so helpful and kind. Made was extremely patient and made it so much easier to get around. We especially enjoyed our trips to Bali Safari and Uforia Chocolate.

REVIEW.Name: Rickard Gardell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for wonderful hospitality. We enjoyed the weekend so much especially the greek salad, breakfast, lunch and dinner. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Nickie Mabey
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for a wonderful holiday. The staff have been excellent, a special thanks to Henny and Rai. The food has been delicious, we loved the Balinese Pig and the villa is gorgeous, we want to stay forever! Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Sally Hasler
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful holiday. We had a group of friends meet at Villa Hansa to celebrate a 40th and it was wonderful. Beautiful Villa, great service and food. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Jane Pearce
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A perfect place for family holiday, there were 10 of us including a child. We had plenty of space for private and communal activities. The gardens and the Balinese touches everywhere blew us away with their beauty and tranquility. We loved the 2 pools and the pool table. A special mention must be made for the care all staff made to make our stay so special. We felt we were at home. Thank you Putu for the really wonderful food and to Made for driving us everywhere and to Henny for making sure we had everything we needed. Thank you Villa Hansa - an unforgettable holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Development Corporation Shenzhen Zhubaijia
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Service is very good. Staff is very friendly, the place of the villa is very beautiful. I think everything is good. Next time we will come here again.

REVIEW.Name: Debbie and Fran Connors
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Firstly we want to thank all the team at Villa Hansa for making our stay very special. The service and smiles from everyone is fabulous. Henny is so friendly and went out of her way to make sure we were looked after. The Chef made gluten free bread specially which is amazing. The facilities are wonderful. The service and staff are exceptional, nothing is too much trouble. Thanks again to you all.

REVIEW.Name: Jim Anderson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Hansa Villa has exceeded our expectations, it is so beautiful with it's landscaped garden and luxurious accommodation. The master suite makes us feel like royalty. The carved canopy is amazing, beautifully crafted by Balinese wood carvers. The ambience in the gardens is pure serenity. The running water, lily ponds and rice paddies opposite the river cocoon us in the very best Bali has to offer. All the staff are so caring and tend to our every need. They are wonderful with a month old Madison, babysitting her while her parents can sit and eat with the rest of the family. It has been so lovely together as a family. It's back to Australia. Thank you Heny and all the lovely staff

REVIEW.Name: Samantha Gallup
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, Thank you, Thank you for the superb service we received during our stay at Villa Hansa! The Villa is even more beautiful in person, the food has been spectacular and Heny, Rebecca and all the staff here amazingly helpful. We so appreciate you letting us check out late and we will definitely recommend the villa to our friends. Thank you for making my 30th Birthday so special.

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Heny and the staff for an amazing stay! We were so impressed with the beautiful wood carvings, the wonderful interior and breath taking view! We will definitely be coming back. Thank you again for such memorable stay.

REVIEW.Name: Stephanie Corbiere
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Big thank you for this amazing journey in Villa Hansa! Everything was perfect, food (thanks Putu), hospitality (thanks Heny and her team), atmosphere and best accommodation book by Rebecca! We really enjoy everyday to make up here and spending time in the garden and at the swimming pool! We will come back!

REVIEW.Name: Naoki Wada
REVIEW.ROverallComments: That was amazing time in Villa Hansa. Super nice people and yummy food. Everything perfect and peaceful. I want to come back to here sometime soon!! Thank you so much, Arigato.

REVIEW.Name: Daylin Koh
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We all had a great time at Villa Hansa. Our stay was made special by the staff teams of Eka, Heny, Putu, Made and everyone here. They all have great smiles at all times. Villa Hansa is surrounded by lots of green and nice padi fields. I specially like - the pools, the dining area, the food - breakfast and dinner (curry & BBQ), - the birthday carvings of 3 fruits by Eka and team, and the snooker table!

REVIEW.Name: Bryn Hughes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We came for 3 day stay for a 40th birthday, with our families. We had an amazing stay and couldn't have been more than happy with the attentive service from all of the staff. Special thanks to Eka and Henny for organizing everything that we needed and wanted. Also to Putu for the amazing food. We loved everything about our staff and our stay. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Dear everybody here at Villa Hansa, we have had the most amazing time here with you! The place and the villa is absolutely beautiful, but most important of all you, the staff are so wonderful. Service, food, and company have been just perfect. We are also so grateful for all the time you have spent with our children. You are all so friendly and lovely, they love you and will all miss you. I hope we can come back to this place and the beautiful people one day. Thank you all so very much!
Many hugs, lots of love from Johanne, Nick, Levi, Jacob, Andrea, Andre, Matt, Mike and Will

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dear Eka, Heny, Putu, Madi, team - thank you for making our 40th birthday and our entire holiday beyond special, we have all made lifelong a memories at Villa Hansa. Your Kindness, attention to detail and attitudes have all made us terribly sad to leave! Thank you for treating us like family Villa Hansa, we will never forget it.

REVIEW.Name: Emil Andersen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for the amazing service, hospitality and smiles. We had a wonderful time at this beautiful villa and can only recommend it to all our friends. Thank you for some amazing days in the villa with great food and even better weekend! Will definitely come back.

REVIEW.Name: Kiera McCormack Carr
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A big thank you to all the lovely staff at Villa Hansa - catering for adults and young children. You made our family Christmas a very special and memorable one! From Christmas decoration to delicious food, and playing with the children. Thank you all again for a lovely time!

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the wonderful stay in Villa Hansa. The staff was extremely friendly.

REVIEW.Name: Villa Hansa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our stay here so special. The hospitality has been outstanding. Every morning we have been greeted by beautiful, warm smiling faces. The staff have made sure we have felt right at home and have gone over and above. Thank you so much for making our stay so memorable. So sad to be leaving, but already planning our return.

REVIEW.Name: Spencer Travel & Southside
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to everyone at Villa Hansa for making our holiday and my 40th birthday so memorable. This villa is so beautiful - everyone loved it and the staff here are so friendly and give such amazing service. We can't wait to come back to see our new friends at Villa Hansa!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Hansa what a stay! You have made our 40th celebration so special and one that will never forgotten. The staff were outstanding we couldn't have asked for a better team. We wish we could stay forever.

REVIEW.Name: Covadonga Alvarez
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a pleasure to spend our time in this wonderful villa, it was like a dream, we promise you. We are sure that we will come back soon, the amazing staff, the incredible rooms, the breakfast, never we have been in a place like this, but the better thing was the people who is working here, they make us feel as we were at home. Thank you for everything. Villa Hansa in our heart.

REVIEW.Name: Victor Ong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Hansa is a beautiful and the staff made our stay excellent with their friendly hospitality. Food was very good and our pool party was a high, thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Hodgson Nola Elizabeth
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the great time that we have had here. What a wonderful week, thanks to all of you and your amazing smiling faces. Thank you for making this such a special holiday, you have made it a wonderful place, you made it for us. Hope to see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: James Stewart
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a fantastic place from the friendliness of the staff to fantastic accommodation. Loved my stay at Villa Hansa. Great staff, exceptional food. All our needs taken care of. I have never feel so relaxed. Will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Julia O'shaughnessy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Hansa is the most incredible place we have ever stayed at. Our family are so happy that we chose to stay here and look forward to next year.

REVIEW.Name: Trish Van Mourick
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our family had a wonderful stay at Villa Hansa. The setting was just perfect for our adults, kids and three grand kids. Thank you to Eka and all the staff who were so kind and attentive to our needs. We made so many wonderful memories. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very efficient service. Love the place, a good place to gateway, close to paradise. Service is outstanding. Very efficient and quick. Also had the best sleep here for months. Thank you Hansa Villa.

REVIEW.Name: Withers Julie
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I have had the most wonderful holiday and the perfect mix of relaxation, fun and good care from the Villa Hansa team. Really not waiting to leave and hope to return again. Everything has been wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Douglas Quine
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Behind hidden doors and away from run frenzy that is Bali lies the oasis that is Villa Hansa. The grounds and ambience surpasses expectations and we will take wonderful memories home with us. Thank you Eka, Henny, Putu Made and everyone who went over and beyond in a peaceful way to take care of us so well, we had a ball!

REVIEW.Name: Holidays of Australia& the World
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a Fabulous stay we had at Villa Hansa. Eka and the staff were so wonderful, helped organize a dinner for my father's 80th birthday - flowers, dinners, cake, decoration. Thank you so much for putting up with our crazy family we had a lovely time.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thankyou Eka and staff for a wonderful stay at Hansa Villa. We hope to see you again another time. Thank you again. Philip, Vanessa, Andy & Erie

REVIEW.Name: Tours Bali Barong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Eka, Putu, Heny and the rest of the staff - you made our vacation a magical time, your service and attention to detail is outstanding. Really felt at peace and got a lot of great food. Your service to us really made our vocation a trip we will never forget . The villa was also incredibly beautiful but honestly its the staff that make the vacation so memorable.

REVIEW.Name: Michele Marshall
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to everyone at Villa Hansa who looked after us. The breakfast was delicious and everyone is so kind, patient and helping. It was a wonderful, relaxing stay in a beautifully kept home and garden. The cooking was fantastic and the staff were all so lovely and kind. We had a gloriously relaxing week here.

REVIEW.Name: Villa Queen Villa Queen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The swimming pool is good for swim. Thank you for a lovely days and nice staff for everything. I have had a wonderful here, thank you so much. A truly magical place with magical staff to make it so memorable. Thank you for everything. Everything about Villa Hansa is perfect. It was the ideal place for our few families to create memories.

REVIEW.Name: Jennifer Verona
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely stay at Villa Hansa. Beautiful staff and fantastic food. Just beautiful, relaxing, quiet with a great staff. All request were met. Thank you for a wonderful experience, we all had a great time. The staff are all great and looked after us. Amazing, truly a beautiful experience.

REVIEW.Name: Shihui Wong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had wonderful stay here at Hansa, the staff are lovely and patient with our various requests. We love the food prepared from the heart, the people here at Hansa made the biggest difference in our stay here. We love the villa and the staff, everyone is so nice and full of smiles, nothing was to much trouble for them. Thank you so much for taking such a good care of us here, especially the young kids and our grandma. The food is very delicious too. We wish our stay was longer. We will miss Villa Hansa and everyone here! Thank you for the memorable holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Jessica Tedd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for a fantastic stay at your villa. The resort is fantastic, staff friendly, food delicious beautiful grounds were enjoyed by all. Thanks again staff.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing place - beautiful people. You can't fault the service - very personal and above and beyond what you expect. Would definitely come back - if we are allowed after our crazy behavior. Such awesome staff and a beautiful villa. Thank you for putting up with our Crazy.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had Such a fantastic a stay at Villa Hansa for our wedding. The grounds of the villa are beyond stunning and all the staff have been so welcoming and attentive. Special mention to Eka, Henny and Putu you were all so very accommodating. Thank you for taking such great care of us and helping to create beautiful holiday memories for us. We will miss you all, especially Henny's beautiful smile, we hope to come again one day. The master suite is the most stunning bedroom we have ever come across, we don't want to leave it. Congratulations to gardener as he keeps all the grounds looking absolutely incredible.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our family and friends have had the best time here in Villa Hansa. We were well looked after and the team worked hard to make our stay the most comfortable and enjoyable one.Thank you everyone for making Chris' 40th birthday a memorable one. From all the coordination to decorations were perfect, you all made it seamless and easy. Thank you very much! We will definitely be back and recommending you to all of our friends.

REVIEW.Name: Ernst Wiman
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful time. We loved the fantastic and attentive service of the staff. The buildings and gardens look even better than in the pictures, we wish we could just pack it all up and take it with us. We hope we will be able to come back and stay again. Many thanks for all your kindness and lovely service. This was an amazing setting for a wedding and family vacation, nice staff and always helpful and friendly. Good luck sweet "Henny" with your baby in December.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is so beautiful and the staff are great and smiling, you are exceptional. During this stay we have had a good time and we eat well. Do not want to go back to France because your smiles we will miss.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Helper Bali Wedding Helper
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was my best choice to choose Villa Hansa in Bali for my wedding. Cozy rooms, pool, beds, service -everything was perfect. Staff was really friendly and always talked to us with smile. Manager Eka and Heny helped us with everything, arranging cars, massages, breakfasts. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is so delicious. So happy to have my wedding in such great villa. Thank you to all staff of Hansa. Love you guys.

REVIEW.Name: Teresa Wade
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Loved our stay at Villa Hansa. The Villa is beautiful the staff amazing. Nothing was too much trouble for them. Excellent service all done with a smile. Thank You.

REVIEW.Name: Rebecca Riley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A small, chariming villa decorated with lovely Indonesian antiques and beautiful accessories. Gorgeous, lush landscape. A lovely holiday spot with cozy rooms and wonderful staff to help make the stay enjoyable.

REVIEW.Name: Paula Dominguez
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We enjoyed our stay at Villa Hansa. It is a nice and charming villa in a quite location. The staff is very polite and made us feel at home. However, in terms of location, it is a little too far away from the beach and traffic is horrible! But in an overall, it is definitly value for money.

REVIEW.Name: Mark Le Feuvre
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great pool and deck area. Bedrooms and bathrooms very comfortable. Living area a little basic and needs up dating and needs some audio equipment. Staff pleasant and helpful but could do with a little more finesse - Needs some signage, very hard for taxis to find. Over all good value.
